runs.comm: really full delivery, shaping away a touch, Gayle is caught at the crease, manages to stab it to the off side
sliding down the leg side, brushes the pad en route to Dhoni
nagging delivery, coming in towards the off and middle, Gayle gets behind the line to defend it to the off side of the pitch
And there goes Gayle. A nonchalant swing of the bat and the length delivery disappears over mid-on. He made it look so easy.
short of length, around 141 kmph, coming in from outside off, mistimes the forcing shot to cover
goes for the yorker, ends up short of the blockhole and Gayle punishes the mistake by drilling it straight past the bowler. Gayle is off to a start here. Can Fletcher keep him company?
pushed well outside off stump and Rudi extends his arms.

The ball goes to the fine-leg boundary but Rudi says it's a dead-ball as Fletcher wasn't offering a shot. It was a length delivery curving in towards pads, Fletcher shaped to play before taking his bat away from the line and the ball bounded away to fine leg
Irfan takes out Fletch. It was full and around the off stump, Fletcher wanted to drill it over mid-off but  mistimed it completely to push it tamely to the fielder there. Soft dismissal.
curving in, nudged to the on side
full in length, just outside off, Gayle stays back to push it to point
stays back to push this one wide of midwicket for a single
Leg slip in place for Lendl who flicks it to backward square leg region
floated outside off stump, driven to Ishant at mid-off for a single
on a length around off stump, carefully defended to the off side of the pitch.
gets on the front foot and turns this through midwicket
quickish, on the middle and off, punched to cover
makes room by going outside leg and lifts the full delivery over mid-off. Gayle and Lendl have a chat.
again, just outside leg, Yusuf pushes this quicker, punched to cover
Crash. It was slighty short in length, Gayle punched it to covers where Harbhajan over runs the ball and slips and the ball rushes to his left and runs to the boundary

ooh .. risky ... almost lbw. Gayle moved around in his crease, opened up his stance and the ball almost skidded to his pad, he managed to get some bit of the bat on the ball and edged to his pad. There is a long-on in place and he is opening up his stance to try to go wider of the man. Risk.
again he opens up his stance, drags the length delivery to Raina at long-on
length delivery, Lendl goes for the pull nevertheless and mistimes it to Ojha at mid-on
he moves towards off stump, tries to paddle scoop it but the ball kept coming towards his body and he ends up dabbing it away. Given leg byes, though.
full length delivery outside off stump, driven to mid-off
short in length, drags the pull to deep backward square leg

What a piece of timing. He took a couple of steps down the track, Yusuf fired it in and Gayle just seemed to punch it. Single to left of mid-on? No it raced away past the diving fielder. Surely the deep midwicket would come across in time? No, it goes past his desperate dive
skids on towards the pad and rolls away to the leg side
on the leg stump again, chipped in the air but safely towards mid-on
quicker one, hit hard but straight to Rohit at cover
backs away a bit and carves a quick delivery over point for couple of runs
from round the stumps, short and wide, mistimes the cut to backward point. He missed out on the four there.
outside off, skidding on, dabbed to backward point
on the off stump, slight turn away, punched to the off side of the pitch where Harbhajan makes a sliding stop
comes in with the arm, towards off stump, punched straight to mid-off. Four dot balls now. Pressure.
leans forward to push to mid-off again
slower this time, loopy delivery on the middle, Gayle leans forward to defend. A maiden over from Bhaji. Fine start by him.
Fine shot by Lendl. It was slightly short in length and just outside off, he arched back to create room and cut it past diving Yuvraj at backward point
cuts into Lendl who tucks it to deep backward square leg
back of length, moves towards off stump, Gayle punches it to point. Anil Kumble drawls on air, "seven dot balls in a row for Chris Gayle" !
short in length and cutting across Gayle who swats it back to Ishant.
the slower one this time, full and outside off, Gayle was setting himself for the big hit, checked himself, adjusted to the slower one and pushed it through cover point
Ishant tries the bouncer, the tactic that worked for the Windies, and nearly gets his man. Lendl was in no position to play the pull, went for it , though and edged it just past square leg
turns in sharply this time from outside off, dabbed to short third man. He usually doesn't turn it this much as he looks to fire 'em in. This time, he slowed up the pace and gave it a tweak
quicker, short in length outside off, punched away to long-off
slower, fuller, on the middle, worked to deep midwicket for a single

The big fish has been caught. India roar in celebration. It was the short-of-length quick delivery on the leg stump line and Gayle went for the pull. Fatal top edge. It lobbed high to short fine-leg where Zaheer Khan took the catch.
flighted slowly this time, outside off, driven to long-off
leans across to steer the off break to backward point region for a single
Flighted delivery on the middle and leg, misses the sweep and it rolls off the pad. Dhoni appeals. He is the only man doing it, though.
turns towards off stump, Bravo adjusts to defend
fuller, bit more air, Bravo leans forward to flick it against the turn through midwicket
flighted full on the middle and leg, Ojha is tempting him to keep flicking against the spin, Bravo pushes it towards  mid-on for a single
rocks back to cut to sweeper cover
Classy inside-out shot. Bravo rushes down the track, stays beside the line of the ball and drives superbly, with the spin, through extra cover.
turning to the pads, clipped past square leg for a single
And now, he unfurls a deft little late cut. It was the quick delivery on the off stump line, Bravo stayed back, opened the bat-face and guided it through the vacant slip region
slightly slower, Bravo tries to repeat the late cut but this time off the front foot and is beaten
leans forward to flick to midwicket
plays the lofted flick shot to wide long-on region
slows up the pace, flighted outside off, flicked to right of midwicket. And Yusuf has finished a very useful spell, where he took out Gayle
from over the wicket now, Bravo charges down the track and drives to long-off
turning past the off stump, dabbed to short third man
plays the lofted shot and it falls short of Ishant at long-off
A very fine shot from Lendl. He stretched forward to loft it high over extra cover.
goes for the sweep, doesn't connect properly
on driven through mid-on for a single
turning into the middle stump line, wristed to right of deep midwicket

What a top shot! Oh boy superbly struck inside-out drive. It was a very good ball actually, Harbhajan had slowed up the pace and flighted it outside off, Bravo adjusted to the change in pace, leaned forward and lifted it over extra cover. Beautiful to watch.
He is a pretty batsman all right. He stretches forward this time to flick it elegantly past square leg
turning in from a length outside off, Lendl goes for the sweep and is struck on the pad outside the line of off stump
top spinner outside off, goes back, opens the bat-face to steer it to backward point
switches to round the stumps now, Bravo stays back to tuck it with the turn past square leg and by the time Ishant runs in from the deep, he will get two runs
from round the stumps, length delivery bouncing in over the off stump, Lendl tried to cut it away but was cramped for room there. Dhoni takes it.
moves outside off, tries to paddle scoop it away but makes no contact and the ball bounces over the leg stump
slower yorker, on the middle and leg, backed away to the leg side but doesn't find power behind the shot and the ball rolls to extra cover
moves outside off to have a swing to the on side, misses but the ball sails down the leg for a wide
chipped towards mid-off and they will get two runs as Raina had to run in all the way from long-off

switches to over the stumps and hits the short of length outside off. Lendle cuts it hard to backward point, lands awkwardly in front of Yusuf Pathan who couldn't get his body behind it. It runs away to the boundary.
works this past square leg
Full pitched on the middle and leg, moves outside leg to push it to mid-off
moves outside leg, Ishant follows him with a short-of-length delivery tilting in, Bravo tries to tuck it away, misses but will pick a leg bye as the ball rolls away to third man region
high bouncer and Rudi signals wide
Wallop but it falls short of deep square leg. It was the short delivery and Lendl pulled it well
Bravo moves down the leg side, Ishant pings him again with a short-of-length delivery, Bravo misses the pull and is hit in the mid-riff
Crashed to the boundary. Lendl backed away to the on side and pulled it hard and this time, through midwicket

nice little slower one, full and outside off, Lendl edges the attempted late cut and it falls short of the tumbling Dhoni. The batsmen are alert enough to rush across for the single before Dhoni got back on his feet

Run out missed. Lendl would have been a goner. Had Dhoni collected the throw ie. It was slower in the air, outside off stump, Lendl is early into his slog sweep and drags it towards short fine-leg. Yuvraj ran to his right and threw the ball to Dhoni who didn't collect. Bravo was inside the crease but Lendl had almost reached the same end
But Lendl falls now, after a very fine knock. He top edged the slog sweep and was caught at deep square leg. Again Ojha slowed up the pace and floated it outside off, and that did the trick.
Flamboyant six to the straight boundary. Great to watch. Bravo waltzed down the track and hit it cleanly right over the bowler's head.
And now unfurls that inside-out lofted hit over extra cover. He went down the track and hit it over the off-side field.
he goes down the wicket again, and plays the lofted shot and it falls short of long-on.
couple of steps down and on drives to Ishant at long-on
leans across to quietly tap it past square leg for a single. 43 from 28 now
fullish, on the middle, on driven to wide long-on for couple of runs.
top spinner outside off stump, Bravo had moved outside leg, he reached out to carve it to deep point
flighted full from round the stumps around the off stump line, Chanderpaul tries to reverse sweep but is hit on the pad
moves down the track to flick it to deep backward square leg
from round the stumps, 138 kmph full delivery outside off, square driven to point

short in length on the middle stump line, Bravo is cramped up but some how manages to flat-bat a pull to left of long on. Surely a four? No, as Raina rushes to his left and makes a diving stop . The crowd roar.

Bravo you beauty! What a innings under pressure.Gem. It was the slower one, Bravo went for the big lofted shot over long-off and it hung in the air for a long time before dipping just over the boundary.
reaches his fifty with a drive towards long-off. The game hangs on a knife's edge here.
And now that Lara-like pull. The front leg hops in the air and the bat comes down and under as he pulls  it past square leg
Chanders gets into the act. Ishant is bleeding here. Full and outside off, Chanders waited before square driving it past the diving point fielder.
yorker on the middle stump, Bravo was looking to come down and digs it out. 104.7 kmph delivery!
Bravo moves outside leg, Harbhajan fires it quick and full, Bravo square drives it through backward point and the ball tips over the boundary. Bravo is da maan.
charges down the track and flicks the fast full toss to right of long leg
almost a run out. Bravo drives another quick delivery to mid-off, Yuvraj with the throw, Harbhajan didn't collect it cleanly and failed to break the stumps. It would have been touch and go.
Thick fat edge but Chanders would take it without any complaint. It was off break outside off stump and Chanderpaul went for the off drive and got a profitable edge
Oh beauty! The reverse sweep. Chanderpaul tried it before but didn't strike well. Not this time, though. He smacked it to deep backward point boundary.
yorker on the middle and leg stump, ends up as a low full toss, flicked to deep square leg
Chanderpaul leans forward to chip it over mid-on
Chanderpaul tries to swing a length delivery across the line but edges it to the off side

Bravooooo! Whaddaaplayaaaaa!  Low full toss on the middle, he moved outside leg and hit it gorgeously inside-out over extra cover for the match-winning six. What a stylish finish. Fabulicous shot to win the game. Bravo is hugged by Chanders. The West Indian fans in the crowd jump for joy.
